content:
@Juan Pablo Tosca Villanueva today @Dieuwertje Bloemen pointed out to me a problem with the table of contents in https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/releases

If you scroll down to 6.2 and click "Release Highlights" you are brought to the list of highlights for 6.3.

She was thinking, "Haven't I read these highlights before?" Yes! She had! For 6.3.

It would probably be a pain to make all these anchors unique.
I dunno, the toc might be more trouble than it's worth. :shrug:
It works on my machine :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
So we can go several routes in here

This issue is only on the release notes because you can see all of them on the same page, we can solve this on 2 ways:
-We add a _6_1 at the id/tag, shouldn't be much trouble and moving forward should be easy to keep an eye on this.
-If we don't see enough value we can remove from a) only the release version or 2) both the release and the repo version
@Juan Pablo Tosca Villanueva want to do a quick zoom? I'll show you.
I fixed it already :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing: but yeah I can zoom you (is that how you say it? :laughing: )

Ah, you did fix it. Thanks! @Dieuwertje Bloemen ^^

No need for a zoom then. :grinning:
Wow I thought we were friends :sad: :laughing:
Yeah moving forward should be easy just to follow the same thing

<a id="table-of-contents-6-3"></a>
# Table of Contents
- [Release Highlights](#release-highlights-6-3)
- [Features](#features-6-3)
- [Bug Fixes](#bug-fixes-6-3)
- [API](#api-6-3)
- [Settings](#settings-6-3)
- [Complete List of Changes](#complete-list-of-changes-6-3)
- [Getting Help](#getting-help-6-3)
- [Upgrade instructions](#upgrade-instructions-6-3)
Seems reasonable. Long live the toc! I guess. :crazy:
the TOC lives on :mechanical_arm:
I didn't change it on 6.2 because fixing it 6.3 automatically fixed 6.2 since there are no longer duplicated references
It might be nice to change them for consistency but whatever.
There's one more toc bug but it's easier to show you. Please remind me next time you are in the office. :grinning:
I will change it on Monday or during the weekend :sweat_smile:
Sounds good, I will remind you about it, thanks!
